item.description:
Facebook event page: http://www.facebook.com/events/380492952029316/

 

So it seems Kelly Stevens, Rachel Fliger, Barbara Jean Crehan & I have accidentally started Project Train Your Dog!

I'm Cassie-Leigh Stock and I got this workbook

(The Dog Tricks and Training Workbook) in a packet with my application for Certified Trick Dog Instructor, and it is actually super cool!  It's like an actual workbook like you used to get in grade school, with a progression of dog tricks using all different (positive) training techniques, and spaces to fill things in & homework & everything!  Tons of clever ideas & smart tips, whether you're an experienced instructor or just got your first puppy!  I was really rather impressed, got all excited and totally caught the training bug!

SOOO, we're all going to get the workbook, start the program INDEPENDENTLY and at home, and compare notes and keep each other motivated as we go through it! We can swap pictures, or get together to practice, or post videos or whatever! Just a fun fall/winter project for us crazy training enthusiasts & our dogs!

Starting the week of the 19th to give everyone a chance to get the book...

I found the book on Amazon for $5.67 & even with FAST shipping, it's still under $13. It's also at any PETsMART... Cheaper online, and here is the link:

http://www.amazon.com/gp/offer-listing/1592535305/sr=/qid=/ref=olp_tab_new?ie=UTF8&colid&coliid&condition=new&me&qid&seller&sr

Who wants in??? Project Train Your Dog! ♥

Feel free to invite your friends who already love working with their dog(s), and those who may need a boost!! :)

**This Project does not have a true location or end time because it is an independent, at-home project, although participants are welcome to get together for practice!! Please use our event page on facebook and this website to keep in touch! PLEASE visit www.facebook.com/nebbc to post pictures and videos, and get in touch with other bully buffs on our affiliated forum, Bully Owners New England (BONE): http://www.facebook.com/groups/B.O.N.E.admin/?ref=ts&fref=ts <--- Join the group if you haven't already!! :)

Let's DO THIS!!

Cassie-Leigh Stock, President & Founder, NEBBC, www.facebook.com/pit.bull.trainer
item.name: Project Train Your Dog! :)
